creator: hubertus@groepper.com
text:
Add new Blog entry. Editing that entry (id="test") with BXE invoked from File
Menu gives a blank page for
blog/authoring/entries/2006/06/10/test/index-bxe.html with Firefox 1.5/Win.
I can confirm this (Firefox 1.5 on Mac).
creator: andreas@apache.org
hubertus@groepper.com
text:
There is <script src="/modules/bxe/bxe/bxeLoader.js" type="text/javascript">
</script> in the default pub when editing with BXE, but it's
script xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" src="/bxe/bxeLoader.js"
type="text/javascript" /> for the Blog.

creator: hubertus@groepper.com
text: works for me with FF 2.0 on Windows. Guess this has been fixed.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: Yes, I (kind of) fixed the BXE integration for the blog pub yesterday.
